type: Public Sector Notice for Contract Opportunity
description: Purchase of historical bulk data for residential and commercial real estate in USA
duration_in_months: Soled Project please \/ Special short Duration-12 months
full_summary:
### 2023 Government Tender Announcement

**Government Agency:** Canada Revenue Agency

**Tender Reference Number:** PW-23-01021570 (Amendment 1)
**Contracting Entity:** Canada Revenue Agency (CRA)
**Procurement Category:** Services
**Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Description of Requirement:**
The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) seeks a contractor to provide historical bulk data for residential and commercial properties located in the United States, where a Canadian is party to a real estate transaction (purchase, sale, or transfer). The resulting contract will have a duration of 30 days.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The selection will be based on a combination of technical merit and price. A ratio of 20% will be assigned to technical merit and 80% to price. Proposals must meet all mandatory evaluation criteria to be considered responsive.

**Submission Instructions:**
Bids must be submitted electronically through the Canada Post Corporation's Connect service. Failure to use the Connect service will result in the bid being rejected. Proposals can be submitted in either English or French.

**Eligibility:**
This procurement may be conditionally set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). To be considered for the set-aside, firms must certify that they are Indigenous-owned and will comply with all requirements of the PSIB.

**Important Dates:**
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-02-27 14:00 EST
- **Publication Date:** 2023-01-16
- **Amendment Date:** 2023-02-07

**Contact Information:**
Please direct all inquiries to Chrystal Imbeau, [Chrystal.Imbeau@cra-arc.gc.ca](mailto:Chrystal.Imbeau@cra-arc.gc.ca) or 613-447-5328.

**Documents and Supporting Information:**
Available for download from [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

---
